name: phil-taylor-com
description: Personal website for Phil E. Taylor

scripts.dev: npx update-browserslist-db@latest && npm run build:css && npx wrangler dev
scripts.deploy: npx update-browserslist-db@latest && npm run build:css && npx wrangler deploy
scripts.start: npx update-browserslist-db@latest && npm run watch:css & npx wrangler dev

author: Phil E. Taylor
